templates.title: OPC Router
templates.description: No-code middleware for industrial applications. The OPC Router connects PLCs, PCS, SCADA, MES, SQL databases and servers, label printers, e-mail servers and erp-systems via OPC UA, MQTT, REST, CSV and many others without any programming effort
